 Deduce a converse implication from a logical equivalence.  (Contributed by NM, 5-Aug-1993.)  (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 22-Sep-2013.)
statement:
biimprd.1 $e |- ( ph -> ( ps <-> ch ) ) $.
biimprd $p |- ( ph -> ( ch -> ps ) ) $.
